title: Variables
text: Represent the number of each type of passengers using variables, raisin as x and nut as (25-x).

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the number of each grain type(in variable form) by its respective value.

title: Conversion
text: Now, translate the expressions that were multiplied by their monetary values into a single equation. This will be $$\operatorname{4.5}\left(x\right)+8\left(25-x\right)=6.6\times25$$.

title: Substitution
text: Plug x into the original relationship to find 25-x.

title: Calculation
text: The answer is 10 pounds of raisins and 15 pounds of nuts.
